sentences.en: Because of the coldness of the weather we stayed indoors.
sentences.cn: 我们因天气寒冷呆在家里.

sentences.en: Cool summer dance sounds are drifting from the stereo indoors.
sentences.cn: 清凉的夏日舞曲的声音从室内音响中传了出来。

sentences.en: Failing good weather, the match will be held indoors.
sentences.cn: 如果天气不好, 比赛将在室内举行.

sentences.en: I always keep indoors by bad weather.
sentences.cn: 由于天气不好,我一直待在房里.

sentences.en: I think perhaps we should go indoors.
sentences.cn: 我觉得也许我们应该进屋里去。

sentences.en: It is very cold outside, you'd better come indoors across the board.
sentences.cn: 外面很冷, 你们所有人最好都进屋.

sentences.en: It rained all day so we had to stay indoors.
sentences.cn: 雨下了整整一天，我们只好留在屋里。

sentences.en: It's a sin to be indoors on holiday.
sentences.cn: 假期中待在家里实在是罪过.

sentences.en: It's rude for a man to keep his hat on indoors.
sentences.cn: 男人进屋不脱帽是不礼貌的.

sentences.en: Let’s go indoors and have something to eat.
Scandals travel a thousand li, while good deeds always stay indoors.
sentences.cn: 恶事传千里, 好事不出门

sentences.en: Spend an evening indoors watching TV.
The children quickly got bored with staying indoors.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在屋子里很快就待不住了。

sentences.en: The crowd moved indoors for what were deemed the most desirable items.
sentences.cn: 人群为了被视为最值得拥有的物品涌入屋里。

sentences.en: They cook out, because there is no enough place indoors.
sentences.cn: 他们在外面做饭, 因为屋里没地方.

sentences.en: Warnings were issued to people living downwind of the fire to stay indoors.
sentences.cn: 已经向住在火势下风处的人们发出不要出门的警告。

sentences.en: We've been cooped up ( indoors ) for hours because of the rain.
sentences.cn: 这场雨把我们困了 ( 在屋里 ) 几个小时.
